reviews.text: I purchased a dishwasher from Lowe’s, Including installation. Dr Plumber sent Rick M to install a dishwasher. Rick did a great job, he picked up and delivered the item on time, efficient, a great communicator, professional, friendly, and cleaned up the work area. I couldn’t be happier with the job performed. I would highly recommend Dr Plumber for your plumbing needs, and I will definitely use them again. Thanks Rick!
Mike showed up at my door ready to solve a few plumbing issues at my house. He was very nice and efficient. I would highly recommend Dr. Plumber for any type of repair.

Our plumber/installer Rick Moore was very professional and polite. Did a fantastic job installing our new dishwasher. Rick was patient with me and answered all of my questions. We will definitely request him for our future plumbing needs. Thank you so much Rick!

They area good honest company. They were able to come fix my broken pipe right away. They were fast and courteous. The quote they gave was accurate and did not try to upsell me on anything. I will definitely call them in the future for any plumbing needs.

My second experience with Dr. Plumber, this time for a clogged kitchen drain that three other companies could not figure out. Mike diagnosed and fixed the issue in 30 minutes. Professional, knowledgeable, fair, and honest. I'll never use another plumber.  Genuinely good people who do great work.
I don’t usually write reviews, but Mike and Melissa both helped so much. I had other companies come out and recommend excess damage or crazy quotes. Very transparent and very honest.

Rick was incredible. Installed my new dishwasher perfectly and even helped me troubleshoot the old one properly so that I can have a spare now even if needed despite other plumbers and an owner (me)  that couldn’t figure out the problems with the old one. Would absolutely recommend him and their services. Very professional and knowledgeable with multiple models.

Our plumber Rick Moore did an excellent job on installation. The day before an issue occurred that made it not possible to install at out appointment time. We made the adjustments needed and he rearranged his schedule to get the installation done without us having to wait for his next available. We will definitely recommend him for any plumbing needs.We are very happy with our results

Rick arrived on time and had our dishwasher installed quickly. He’s very knowledgeable about his job and gets right to work. Very pleasant and personable guy.
Thank you Rick for a job well done!

We had a water heater emergency and they were at my house within an hour or two to stop the leak. Then came back the following day to replace the unit. Fabulous company with amazing employees. Mike was great!

My installer from Dr. Plummer (Lowe’s) was Rick Moore and he did a fantastic job. Kept in contact with me before his arrival, was on time, and had installation done within an hour. Answered all my questions, also hauled away my old dishwasher, great job, Rick!
Rick installed our new dishwasher that we purchased from lowes.  He was very friendly and professional.  He took his time making sure the installation was done correctly.  Highly recommend him.

Awesome service! We called at night and they were here early the next morning. So nice and knew exactly what the problem was and fixed a leak we had in a water heater pipe. Price was much less than we expected! They are awesome! Best service, best prices  ever!

I bought a KitchenAid dishwasher from Lowe’s, which included insulation by Dr. Plumber. Dr. Plumber sent Rick to install the dishwasher. He did a great job. Show me how everything worked and I’m very pleased.

Rick is an excellent installer, polite, orderly, on time, respective of my property, answered all of my questions, did a great dishwasher install, and didn't leave any mess for me to clean up.  Rick even used the recycle bin!  Highly recommend!

Rick of Dr. Plumber installed a dishwasher in our kitchen on 9/26/2023 at 1928 Overland St. Fort Worth TX. The old dishwasher  cannot be pulled out from inside the cabinet only to discover that a protruding nail on the side of the cabinet was preventing the dishwasher to be pulled out. Rick was so patient and very persistent in trying to remove the protruding nail deep inside from the side of the cabinet. He used all kinds of tools available to remove the nail without success in the first few ho
Mike was great ! Did a fantastic job installing our new sink ! Very friendly and cleaned up we will be calling them again! 😊 …

I used Dr Plumber Service today they came earlier then schedule time. They when right to my problem where I’ve been having my problem. They listen and diagnose the situation and fixed my problem.
The rep also provided little helpful tips to prevent and slow down this constant issue, so I did appreciate that information.
I would recommend Dr. Plumber to the next person who’s having plumbing issues.
There was no pressure tactic in like they seems to analyzing other problems or issues that you didn

Rick is the most professional and courteous plumber or appliance installer that I’ve use in 40 years of work in my home and rental properties.  He is exceptionally knowledgeable and thorough. I would choose him over any other.
Rick was very honest and did a great job with the installation of my dishwasher.   When he found dents on the new dishwasher he helped me return it.   Would highly recommend him!

The best!  I was recommended to Dr. Plumber by Handyman Home Pros (another 5-star company), and was not disappointed.  After having other plumbers come out and give me bids to add a sink in a bathroom, Dr. Plumber's prices were the best I could find, and work quality was perfect. I've since used their services twice.  They are now my go-to company for all things plumbing, thanks David and Mike!

My water heater completely died...3 days before Xmas eve. On the morning they were called, Mike showed up about 1130a and I had a new water heater by 3p. Great job!  Very efficient and we'll organized.  And he did the whole thing by himself.  I was really impressed.
Mr Moore did a great job installing our new dishwasher. Trim had to be cut to fit the new one, professional install, very easy to talk to. Thanks!
Excellent service! Rick was right on time for dishwasher installation. Communication regarding installation with Dr. Plumber was courteous and professional.
The installation went very well and the mechanic was amazing! Thank you so much Rick Moore!

Mike from Dr. Plumber replaced four forty year old leaking outside faucets for us and did an outstanding job. All four faucets were mounted through the brick exterior of the house which made the job more difficult. We were very pleased with his work and the total price of the repairs.
I  was very happy with the plumbing  work done by Mike Milburn . He replaced my kitchen faucet and 3    bathroom faucets. Very professional . I highly recommend Dr Plumber Co

Thank you so much for Mike coming to rescue my kitchen and bathtub water backup problems. He has more than 30 years of experience in Plumbing, He deserves the Dr. Plumber title.
Thanks.
Anna C.

We had a dishwasher installed  Very prompt. Was well informed as to installation. Very neat, did not leave a mess. He made sure to explain how the appliance worked. I would highly recommend this installer.
Rick installed our new dishwasher, and he was 110% professional and efficient!  We will be sure to request him for future plumbing needs.  Thanks!

Dr. Plumber installed some new valves and fixtures in my bathroom. Would call again.
Update: called them back a few months later to cap a gas line in my kitchen. Got me scheduled in a timely way, showed up on schedule, and got the job done quickly. Will use again

I was selling a house in Keller and got Dr Plumber's info from a handyman. I called Dr Plumber and spoke to David and he was very professional and very reasonably priced. I had him reseat two toilets, adjust a shower head, and a garbage disposal.

I would definitely recommend Dr Plumber for any of your plumbing needs.

We’ve used DR. Plumber for a few years now and always experience prompt, professional and reliable service. You are notified the night before your appointment to give you an expected arrival time and also called the day of when the plumber is on his way. We always know they will fix the problem and you couldn’t ask for better customer service!
Rick did a fantastic job. Installed the new dishwasher we bought from Lowe’s. Explained everything at the end.
He came on time and did an excellent job installing my dishwasher and was very thorough. He definitely knows what he is doing and would recommend him!
Rick came by and did an awesome job for us! Super professional, clean and fast! 10 out of 10 would work with them again.

Rick did a great job with the installation. Took the time and paid attention to details.
Definitely recommend Rick with Dr. Plumber!
Quick service!  Mike has been at our house a few times for repairs and does great work. Highly recommend them!
Mike was awesome!!  Best prices around!
Rick Moore installed our new dishwasher, and it works great. Very happy with everything and grateful for his help.
Rick did a great job installing our dishwasher! Professional and thorough!

Berry professional and good looking.
on time and comunicacion at all times .I'm happy and berry satisfied with he's service . Rick Moore
Was on time, courteous and performed the installation very well. He knows his dishwashers well. I am very pleased with his work.
Rick did a great job! Very professional and thorough. Would highly recommend!
Rick was great! In and out quickly- and very friendly- even with my dog.
Mike was super responsive and knowledgeable. And helpful. We woukd highly recommend DR Plumber
Rick from Dr. Plumber was quick, informative and very professional. Will be coming back to them again.
Rick Moore was professional and efficient. I’m very happy with his service.
Rick Moore was early, personable, and did a great job!
Rick Moore was very professional and helpful with the installation.  Thanks
